translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、こら！　食べ物粗末にするな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, stop! Don't waste food."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「食えねェモンは食い物とは呼ばねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I can't eat it, I don't call it food."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「飢えてるくせにグルメな奴だなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're a gourmet even though you're starving."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空腹が調味料になるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hunger is the seasoning, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「飢えちゃいねぇよ。俺は…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not starving. I..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいさして、言葉が勝手に止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanted to say more, but the words stopped on their own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人だと、言えばどうなるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what would happen if I said I was a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は…………ちょいと、立ち寄っただけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just... stopped by for a moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに帰ェんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll be leaving soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を言おうとしたのか、何を躊躇ったのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What I was trying to say, what I hesitated over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分からないまま踵を返し、去っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, I turned on my heel and walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、そっか……引き留めたか。ごめんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I see... you tried to keep him. Sorry about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気をつけろよー。またスられたりすんなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Be careful! Don't get pickpocketed again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を振るメアリーに背を向け、レイは歩きだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turning his back to Mary who waved her hand, Rei started walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、うわわっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, whoa!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、背に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right on his back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逼迫した声が、突然ぶつかってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A desperate voice suddenly crashed against him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、なにすんだっ！　離せッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what are you doing!? Let go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーは大きな手に首根っこを捕まえられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary's neck was grabbed by a large hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 路地裏に引きずり込まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she was dragged into the alley.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、こいつかお前を邪魔したってのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so this is the one who got in your way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、そうだよ、父ちゃん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right, Dad!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーを捕まえた手の持ち主に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the owner of the hand who grabbed Mary,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必死に訴えていたのは、スリの少年だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the pickpocket boy was desperately pleading.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アンの家のブサイクチビじゃねぇか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't that the ugly runt from Ann's house?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父もくたばったのに、まだ生きてたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though your old man kicked the bucket, you're still alive?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでうちのガキに喧嘩売るってのはなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So what's with picking a fight with my kid?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上前でもはねるつもりだったのか？　あぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were you planning to skim off the top? Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お前の子供がスリなんかしてるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I was just scolding your kid because he's pickpocketing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叱っただけだ！　お前がすることだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what you're supposed to do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッせぇな。こいつがアガリ持って来なきゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up. If this guy didn’t bring the loot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はどうやって酒を飲めばいいんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how am I supposed to drink my booze?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辟易した声に、きついアルコールの匂いがした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A weary voice carried a strong smell of alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぶっ……ぐぐ、うぐぐ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... gug, ngg...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「金も持ってやがらねぇだろうし……ちっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He probably doesn’t even have money... Tch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンドバックにでもするかな、っと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I’ll just use him as a punching bag—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What, I don’t care who you are, back off—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、誰だか知らんが引っ込んで――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know who you are, but back off—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゅぶっ、が、ば……っ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyub, gah, ba...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイの蹴りを受けた男は、派手に宙を舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man who received Rei’s kick flew dramatically through the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物の二階ほどの高さまで打ち上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was thrown up to nearly the height of a second floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大通りに倒れ込んだ時には既に炭クズになっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and by the time he collapsed onto the main street, he had turned to ashes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃあああぁぁっ！　な、なに！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaahhh! Wh-what was that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、雷、っ……？　なんじゃアイツ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Li-lightning...? What was that guy...?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法……じゃない……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that... magic...?"
"He-hey...!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「飢えてるくせにグルメな奴だなぁ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, I turned on my heel and walked away.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary's neck was grabbed by a large hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 路地裏に引きずり込まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she was dragged into the alley.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so this is the one who got in your way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、そうだよ、父ちゃん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right, Dad!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーを捕まえた手の持ち主に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the owner of the hand who grabbed Mary,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必死に訴えていたのは、スリの少年だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the pickpocket boy was desperately pleading.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アンの家のブサイクチビじゃねぇか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't that the ugly runt from Ann's house?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父もくたばったのに、まだ生きてたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though your old man kicked the bucket, you're still alive?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでうちのガキに喧嘩売るってのはなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So what's with picking a fight with my kid?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上前でもはねるつもりだったのか？　あぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were you planning to skim off the top? Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お前の子供がスリなんかしてるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I was just scolding your kid because he's pickpocketing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叱っただけだ！　お前がすることだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what you're supposed to do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッせぇな。こいつがアガリ持って来なきゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up. If this guy didn’t bring the loot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はどうやって酒を飲めばいいんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how am I supposed to drink my booze?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辟易した声に、きついアルコールの匂いがした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A weary voice carried a strong smell of alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぶっ……ぐぐ、うぐぐ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... gug, ngg...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「金も持ってやがらねぇだろうし……ちっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He probably doesn’t even have money... Tch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンドバックにでもするかな、っと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I’ll just use him as a punching bag—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What, I don’t care who you are, back off—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、誰だか知らんが引っ込んで――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know who you are, but back off—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゅぶっ、が、ば……っ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyub, gah, ba...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイの蹴りを受けた男は、派手に宙を舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man who received Rei’s kick flew dramatically through the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物の二階ほどの高さまで打ち上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was thrown up to nearly the height of a second floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大通りに倒れ込んだ時には既に炭クズになっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and by the time he collapsed onto the main street, he had turned to ashes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃあああぁぁっ！　な、なに！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaahhh! Wh-what was that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、雷、っ……？　なんじゃアイツ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Li-lightning...? What was that guy...?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法……じゃない……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that... magic...?"
"He-hey...!"
